## perlinNoise3D() function

Generate a float perlin noise value from a vec3

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function perlinNoise3D(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, p: PBShaderExp): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  p | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | 3d vector |

**Returns:**

any

a float noise value
